Numbering of the positive roots in E7 used by GAP. This list was produced by running 
RequirePackage("sla");;
L:= SimpleLieAlgebra("E",7,Rationals);;
for i in [1..63] do Print(i, " ", PositiveRootsNF(RootSystem(L))[i],"\n"); od;
and then formatting the plain text output slightly for convenience.

1 1000000
2 0100000
3 0010000
4 0001000
5 0000100
6 0000010
7 0000001
8 1010000
9 0101000
10 0011000
11 0001100
